required_fields.name: string - Full name for hero section and navigation logo

optional_fields.linkedinUrl: string - LinkedIn profile URL for social links
optional_fields.githubUrl: string - GitHub profile URL for social links

skills.name: string - Skill name (e.g., 'React', 'Python')
skills.percentage: number - Skill level 0-100 for circular progress

Creative_Template_Requirements.note: Template file exists but needs to be implemented with Jinja2 variables
